room_title: Escape room "The Witching Hour" by Locked Manhattan in Manhattan
review: This was fun! The Witching Hour is challenging, but not discouraging. I can't wait to do the other rooms.

room_title: Escape room "The Witching Hour" by Locked Manhattan in Manhattan
review: So much fun! We did the Witching Hour. We cannot wait to go back and try the other two rooms! Highly recommend Locked Manhattan for family fun and a couples night!

room_title: Escape room "The Witching Hour" by Locked Manhattan in Manhattan
review: We had great time solving puzzles in the Witching Hour. Our first escape room and probably solved more than half the puzzles. Even the little kids contributed to the puzzles. We'll try another of their rooms soon, probably Dinner.

room_title: Escape room "The Witching Hour" by Locked Manhattan in Manhattan
review: My husband and I came here for part of our day date and tried The Witching Hour. We were about 1.5 steps away from winning when we ran out of time. It was definitely difficult but still fun. This is a great activity if you like mental stimulation. We'll be back again for sure!

room_title: Escape room "The Witching Hour" by Locked Manhattan in Manhattan
review: We had an absolutely amazing time. Did The Witching Room as a couple (2 person group/date night), and it was incredibly challenging. Definitely want to go back with a few friends and try the other rooms. Would highly recommend to anyone that enjoys problem solving and critical thinking!
